message.body: Ct scan came back normal but he's so sick they're keeping him overnight on pain meds while we wait for more test results. He's making jokes about his shit though so thats a good sign!
Good deal glad u went hah.. told them u will b out tomorrow Bob said forsure that's fine..
Thank you so much. My dads been really happy to have everyone back
Maybe w u all there will make for a speedy recovery..take ur time girly
